prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with a menacing look and vibrant purple skin.
Imagine a powerful poison-type Pokemon with sharp spikes and a fierce expression.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves from a small creature into a large, intimidating monster.
Show me a Pokemon designed for combat, featuring a muscular build and strong legs.
Give me a dual-type Pokemon that thrives in both urban and mountainous environments.
Make a Pokemon with a striking contrast of colors and an aggressive fighting style.
Design a creature that is both rare and formidable, with unique evolutionary traits.
